item.title: Preparing data for Apsim Classic
item.description: Key comments Example 1: Weather data Example 2: Site data Example 3: Dry matter and soil water content data Contributed By Stephanie Langer Key comments The data should be organised in a way Apsim can read it. The screenshots below show examples for different templates. First some general comments: Data can be stored one file or separated, even csv is fine; Some optional comments in the top (comments start with a â€œ!
